summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Sycamore Avenue and 2nd Avenue Northwest, each from the north line of Electric Motor Line Addition to North 73rd Street; of 3rd Avenue Northwest, from the north line of Electric Motor Line Addition to North 74th Street; of 1st Avenue Northwest, from North 73rd Street to North 74th Street; all in the City of Seattle, providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
